item.title: Bash Cheatsheet
item.content: <iframe src='https://shuai.dev/embed?bg=rgba(74,144,226,0)&t=blackboard&wt=none&l=shell&ds=false&dsyoff=60px&dsblur=68px&wc=true&wa=true&pv=5px&ph=5px&ln=false&fl=1&fm=Fira+Code&fs=16px&lh=152%25&si=false&es=2x&wm=false&code=%0a%23%20colorful%20output%0asource%20%3c%28curl%20-s%20%2f%2fshuai.dev%2fbash_colors%2fbash_colors.sh%29%0a' style='width: 100%; border:0; transform: scale(1); overflow:hidden;' onload='javascript:(function(o){o.style.height=o.contentWindow.document.body.scrollHeight+"px";}(this));' sandbox="allow-scripts allow-same-origin"> </iframe>
